hibernate-mapping.query: select distinct(p) from Agenda a right join a.profissional p where a.dataAgenda = :data order by p.nome
select a from Agenda a where a.dataAgenda = :data order by a.horaChegada
select a from Agenda a where a.dataAgenda = :data and a.situacaoMarcacaoAgenda = :situacaoMarcacaoAgenda order by a.horaChegada
